'''1.9.3-pre1''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.9.3]], released on April 21, 2016, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160421162320/http://mojang.com/2016/04/minecraft-193-pre-release-1/|title=Minecraft 1.9.3 Pre-Release 1|website=Mojang.com|date=April 21, 2016|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|tp}}'''
* No longer teleports the player to a Y-coordinate outside the range -512 to 512.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.9.3 Pre-Release 1|prefix=Minecraft
|;From released versions before 1.9.2
|82464|Colored 'dead' skin template parts cause in-game issues.
|88357|Crash when going outside height limit or into the void with F3.
|89760|Skin's jacket parts do not show up under specific conditions.
|;From version 1.9.2
|100410|Corrupting world by teleporting to y{{=}}(-) infinity.
}}</onlyinclude>
